product.inc File Reference

Functions to output Product Info. More...

Go to the source code of this file.

Functions

 getImages ($product, $type= 'generic')

Detailed Description

Functions to output Product Info.

Various pieces of info gleamed from the web will be handled by functions contained in this file. Currently, it only handles getting product images

Definition in file product.inc.

Function Documentation

getImages ( $  product,
$  type = 'generic' 
)

Gets Appropriate Images from google Image Search

Parameters:
$product The product to get images for
$type The Product type to search for, defaults to a generic product. If it is a book, "book" is appended to the search query to narrow the result to what should be book covers.
Returns:
HTML code to output product images
